text: Mavis Ogun (born 24 August 1973) is a Nigerian former footballer defender. She was in the Nigeria women's national football team. She played at the 1991 FIFA Women's World Cup, 1995 FIFA Women's World Cup and 1999 FIFA Women's World Cup. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian footballers Category:1991 FIFA Women's World Cup players Category:1995 FIFA Women's World Cup players Category:1999 FIFA Women's World Cup players Category:Association football defenders
title: Mavis Ogun
